revision.text:
===EV Damage Multiplier=== EVs increase the amount of damage that a Pokémon does. EVs multiply the damage indefinitely. If your Pokémon has fewer than 50 EVs, a Pokémon's EV Damage Multiplier increases by 0.01 per EV, and consequently a Pokémon gains 1% extra damage per EV for the first 50 EVs.

Pokémon that have: contracted Pokérus, have left the hatchery after contracting Pokérus (ie: not ''Infected''), and have gained less than 50 EVs are considered
